name: @fav/prop.defaults
description: Copys own enumerable properties of source objects to destination object for each destination properties is undefined or null.

scripts.web:build: npm run web:build-src && npm run web:build-test
scripts.web:build-src: browserify index.js --standalone fav.prop.defaults -o web/fav.prop.defaults.js && cd web && uglifyjs fav.prop.defaults.js --compress --mangle -o fav.prop.defaults.min.js --source-map url=fav.prop.defaults.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build

author: Takayuki Sato
